name: Sectus, Drawi's Son
description:
Sectus, Drawi's Son, is a mini metroidvania platformer game, where you will need to collect IMPORTANT and ANTIQUE relics, for some random dude, so you can enter the sect you always dreamed of.

Controls:

Move -> A/W/S/D.

Jump -> Space.

Dash -> Shift Left .

Go Down -> e

Objectives:

You have to enter the dungeon and open all the chests in the dungeon to get the 5 music discs which with the help of the radio will increase your power of faith. 

As you get discs, the character grows in size and thanks to this mechanic you can reach places where you couldn't before, and as you get discs you can switch the game music in the radio menu.

We are Invo Studios;

Invo Studios is a tight-knit group of friends who share a passion for video game design and development. Our Members are;

Ricard Ruíz, Jordi Borraz, Ian García and Daniel Sánchez.
